subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hisanori Takahashi, whose start was pushed up two days when Mike Pelfrey was sidelined with a stiff upper back, allowed six runs in the first three innings, and the San Francisco Giants went on to beat the Mets.
snippet: Hisanori Takahashi, whose start was pushed up two days when Mike Pelfrey was sidelined with a stiff upper back, allowed six runs in the first three innings, and the San Francisco Giants went on to beat the Mets.
